cluster: Reason with shapes and their attributes.
description: Partition circles and rectangles into two and four equal shares, describe the shares using the words , , and , and use the phrases , , and . Describe the whole as two of, or four of the shares. Understand for these examples that decomposing into more equal shares creates smaller shares.
